programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Flashbacks tell the story of a tenderfoot who rose to glory by gunning down the outlaw terrorizing his small town.

programme.title: Max 2: White House Hero, (2017, Children)
programme.desc: Max, a military service dog, is assigned to serve on the U.S. president's Secret Service detail.

programme.title: Beauty Shop, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: After a falling-out with an overbearing employer, reputed hairstylist Gina decides to go independent. Soon enough, she opens the doors of her new salon to an amusing crowd of patrons.

programme.title: Gallipoli, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Two Outback runners (Mark Lee, Mel Gibson) join Australian and New Zealand troops fighting in World War I.

programme.title: The Dogs of War, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Jamie, a mercenary, is hired by a large corporation to help liberate Zangaro, a small African nation, from an iron-fisted despot. Once there, Jamie learns more about the plight of the country's people and joins the Zangaro people's fight.

programme.title: The Mod Squad, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: A police captain saves three young adults (Claire Danes, Giovanni Ribisi, Omar Epps) from jail, recruiting them to work under cover in Los Angeles.

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra, they are also forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries (Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke) to battle a greedy industrialist (Peter Sarsgaard) and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: An upstart stock-car driver goes to the edge for his manager, his brain-surgeon girlfriend and himself.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask, (1998, Adventure)
programme.desc: The musketeers rescue their king's true heir from the Bastille.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: A group of Allied soldiers are intent on breaking out, not only to escape, but also to draw Nazi forces away from battle to search for fugitives. Among the prisoners are American Captain Virgil Hilts and British Squadron Leader Roger Bartlett.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Adventure)
programme.desc: An imperious woman (Katharine Hepburn) makes a gin-soaked boat captain (Humphrey Bogart) fight Germans in the World War I Congo.

programme.title: The Wasp, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two estranged friends unveil a dangerous and deceptive plot that forever changes their lives.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: An English charmer (Hugh Grant) and a lusty American (Andie MacDowell) make love over a course of surprising events.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A sorority queen (Reese Witherspoon) enrolls in Harvard to prove to her former boyfriend that she has more than good looks.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fired from her firm, a young Boston lawyer (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C., to fight for animal rights.

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a man claiming to be Fester, the missing brother of Gomez Addams, arrives at the Addams' home, the family is thrilled. Morticia begins to suspect the man is a fraud, since he cannot recall details of Fester's life.

programme.title: Addams Family Values, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Upon arrival of their mustachioed baby, Morticia and Gomez hire a greedy nanny who targets Uncle Fester.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland team's new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: A literary baseball groupie (Susan Sarandon) romances a pitcher (Tim Robbins) and a catcher (Kevin Costner) on a minor-league North Carolina team.

programme.title: 48 HRS., (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A rumpled detective gets a slick convict released into his custody for two days to help him find a murderer in San Francisco.

programme.title: Dog, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldier's funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: Jason's Lyric, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: A TV salesman falls for a spirited waitress and clashes with his wayward brother, as their lives reconnect in inner-city Houston.

programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A money launderer (Stellan Skarsgard) for Russian gangsters asks a couple vacationing in Marrakech, Morocco, to deliver incriminating evidence to an MI6 agent (Damian Lewis).

programme.title: Bones and All, (2022, Romance)
programme.desc: Love blossoms between a young woman on the margins of society and a disenfranchised drifter as they embark on a 3,000-mile odyssey through the backroads of America.

programme.title: Dark Harvest, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Teens confront a legendary supernatural specter that emerges from the cornfields of a small Midwestern town every fall.

programme.title: A House on the Bayou, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Hoping for an idyllic getaway, a couple and their daughter visit a remote mansion in rural Louisiana. When suspiciously friendly neighbors show up uninvited, the weekend soon takes a sinister turn as dark secrets test the family's fragile bond.

programme.title: Blink Twice, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: Ben-Hur, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: A prince (Jack Huston) endures years of slavery to take vengeance on his adopted brother (Toby Kebbell), a Roman officer who falsely accused him of treason.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: An Irish ringleader (Natascha McElhone) organizes an international team of hired guns (Robert De Niro, Jean Reno) to retrieve a briefcase from criminals.

programme.title: Training Day, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: A rookie police officer meets a corrupt Los Angeles narcotics detective who wants to include him in his schemes.

programme.title: Novocaine, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage. He fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy City's police force.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: After her dreams of becoming a WNBA player are cut short by a tragic accident, Zainab Johnson finds her way to the stage, where her smart and edgy storytelling is informed by her experiences growing up in Harlem in an African-American Muslim family.

programme.title: Snack Shack, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Best friends AJ and Moose seize the opportunity to run the local pool's rundown snack shack. However, things take an unexpected turn when they meet Brooke, an effortlessly cool lifeguard who puts their big summer plans -- and friendship -- at risk.

programme.title: Jacob's Ladder, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet prone to flashbacks walks the edge of sanity as he searches for the cause of his nightmarish visions.

programme.title: Pet Sematary: Bloodlines, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: In 1969, a young Jud Crandall dreams of leaving his hometown of Ludlow, Maine, behind but soon discovers sinister secrets buried within and is forced to confront a dark family history that will forever keep him connected to Ludlow.

programme.title: Invaders From Mars, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A boy (Hunter Carson) sees his parents and neighbors act like zombies after a flying saucer lands in his back yard.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Horror)
programme.desc: A Maine professor's (Timothy Hutton) hidden bad side comes alive under his notorious but successful pen name.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A half-alien female (Natasha Henstridge) escapes from a government compound to search for the half-alien male who has been raping and fatally impregnating women.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.title: Smile 2, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Global pop sensation Skye Riley begins to experience increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and pressures of fame, she must face her dark past to regain control of her life.

programme.title: Rings, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman (Matilda Lutz) makes a horrifying discovery after her boyfriend (Alex Roe) investigates a story about a mysterious video that kills people seven days after they watch it.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men (John Goodman, John Gallagher Jr.).

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2024, Musical)
programme.desc: A new student gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics. However, when she makes the misstep of falling for the queen bee's ex-boyfriend, she finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Exodus, (1960, History)
programme.desc: An Israeli nationalist (Paul Newman), a U.S. nurse (Eva Marie Saint) and 611 Jewish refugees break a 1947 British blockade.

programme.title: Child's Play, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Two teachers (James Mason, Robert Preston) breed violence at a boys boarding school, with a gym teacher (Beau Bridges) in the middle.

programme.title: Coffy, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: A nurse (Pam Grier) seeks revenge on those she holds responsible for her 11-year-old sister's drug addiction.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Comedy)

programme.title: Os rapazes esto sendo obrigados pelas suas mes a dormirem na casa de Kenny para que sejam contaminados com o vrus da catapora. Enquanto isso, Sheila tenta consertar a amizade falida entre seu marido e o pai de Kenny.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: South Park est em festa! o "Dia das Vacas", e os cidados podem passear pela feira, conferir um monumento e a grande corrida das vacas. Enquanto isso, os rapazes fazem de tudo para ganhar uns bonecos de Terrance e Philip.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O Chef est sendo processado por tentar obter os direitos autorais de uma cano que escreveu h 20 anos atrs. Para ajud-lo nesta batalha, os garotos organizam um concerto para arrecadar dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A tia Flo est de visita e d um presente para Stan: um peixe medonho. Com o tempo, comeam a aparecer alguns cadveres por a, e a me de Stan tenta fingir que no tem nada a ver.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan foge de casa e vai Nebraska. Os rapazes querem ver o senhor Hanckey na noite de Natal. E o tio de Cartman e Charles Manson escapam da priso e se escondem no poro dos Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes so obrigados a escreverem textos sobre pequenas empresas para que o senhor Garrison no perca o seu trabalho como professor. Os meninos se juntam com Tweek, que sugere um novo tema para a redao: "Gnomos que roubam cuecas".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e kyle descobrem um homem que estava preso no gelo h mais de trs anos, mas acabam brigando para ver quem o descobriu e qusl nome dar para ele.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Vrios habitantes de South Park esto ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razo aparente. Randy o principal responsvel para descobrir uma soluo para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereo".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Chef tem uma namorada nova e ao que parece, uma relao sria. Agora os rapazes esto preocupados com isso. Enquanto isso, Cartman est com problemas nos olhos e odeia ter que ir ao seu oculista, que o chama de "porquinho".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman, Kyle e Stan enganam Tweek e Craig para que eles lutem um contra o outro. Enquanto isso, um dos professores est sendo atormentado por uma recordao de sua falecida namorada, e Kenny conquista um homem rico na aula de cozinha.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman descobre uma criatura em extino durante um acampamento. No incio, todos acham legal, mas em seguida, todos se do conta que na verdade esta criatura, na verdade, um animal pr-histrico extremamente chato.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A aula do senhor Garrison recebe uma visita: Petey, o panda do abuso sexual, que ensina tudo aos rapazes sobre o tema. Em seguida, Cartman decide processar Stan por cham-lo de "chupa cu", e contrata o pai do Kyle para ser seu advogado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A senhora Cartman vai para uma festa e deixa o seu filho sob os cuidados de Shelley. Agora, Cartman est preso em sua casa e precisa lidar com os abusos de Shelley, seu namorado de 22 anos e sua gata que est no cio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan tem que ir com os seus pais para uma festa chata repleta dos alunos menos populares do colgio, como Butters, Pip e Dougie. Enquanto isso, Randy e Gerald passam por uma situao um tanto quanto incmoda em uma jacuzzi.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dois caras nus em uma banheira

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes esto viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma pardia de Pokmon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um garoto encontra uma nave espacial e a usa para escapar de um ritual crito na Etipia, e buscar um novo lugar para ele e seu povo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle, Stan, Kenny e Cartman querem aproveitar a noite de Halloween para assustar os rapazes do quinto ano, ento desenterram o cadver da av de Kyle. Enquanto isso, a banda Korn visita South Park.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: O mistrio irado do fantasma pirata da banda

programme.title: A me de Cartman d um presente para ajud-lo a ganhar o concurso de soletrar. Trata-se de um "macaco da fontica". Neste concurso, os rapazes conhecem Marc e Rebecca, dois irmos que no vo para a escola, pois estudam em suas casas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Durante uma recreao sobre a guerra civil americana, Cartman lidera o exrcito dos Confederados para atacar os guerreiros da Unio do outro lado da Amrica. Tudo isso para poder ganhar uma aposta de Kyle e Stan.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O senhor Hanckey apresenta dez musicais baseados em canes clssicas de Natal, cantadas por Kyle, Cartman, Stan, Kenny e todos os demais habitantes de South Park em seu prprio especial de Natal. Inclui os hits "Noite Feliz" e muito mais!
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Os clssicos de Natal do Senhor Hankey

programme.title: Cartman e Kenny acham que esto menstruando, mas na realidade, esto com uma infeco. Agora, Kyle e Stan tambm querem menstruar. Enquanto isso, se aproxima o novo milnio e os habitantes exigem que Jesus apresente Deus para eles.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Voc est a, Deus? Sou eu, Jesus

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Ento eles resolvem roubar dentes, j que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle est doente e sua me est tentando curar ele atravs da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas romnticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Chef est furioso pois acha que a bandeira de South Park racista e quer que a mudem. Mas por outro lado, Jimbo (apoiado pelos KKK), acha que faz parte da histria e que no deveriam mudar coisa alguma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Norman - Confie em Mim, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Norman Oppenheimer um picareta do mercado financeiro que tenta sua sorte na cidade de Nova York. Tentando ser amigo de todos, ele fora seu caminho at se infiltrar no crculo interno de ricaos e de figures da poltica.

programme.title: Uma Aventura Animal, (1970, Action)

programme.title: Trumbo - Lista Negra, (1970, Action)

programme.title: Um Amor Altura, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem encontra o celular de Diane e entra em contato para devolv-lo. Quando se encontram, ela tem uma surpresa: ele tem apenas 1,36 m. Os dois logo se apaixonam, mas ela no est pronta para lidar com o preconceito de namorar um homem to baixo.

programme.title: Meu Trabalho um Parto, (1970, Action)

programme.title: 72 Horas Depois, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de se envolver com um perigoso sindicato do crime, um policial disfarado acorda e descobre que perdeu seu parceiro, sua esposa e os ltimos trs dias de sua vida.

programme.title: Perseguio Radical, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de perder sua esposa e ainda ser preso, um homem descobre que seu filho foi recrutado por uma importante e perigosa organizao criminosa. Agora ele deve arriscar tudo para salv-lo.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Mecnico chins vai para o Japo para encontrar o seu grande amor, mas descobre que ela se casou com um lder mafioso. Ele vira um assassino profissional e logo vai ganhando poder entre os criminosos, tornando-se o lder de uma gangue de imigrantes.

programme.title: At o Final, (1970, Action)

programme.sub-title: Shanks em Ao! O Alicerce de uma Era Fora de Controle

programme.title: Luffy e Chopper se arriscam para salvar uma menina desamparada pela perda de seu animal de estimao.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Uma Menina em Busca de seu Yagara! A Grande Busca na Cidade das guas!

programme.title: O dia de Zoro comea uma loucura quando a busca de uma nova espada se transforma num caso de famlia!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mes So Fortes! Os Puxados Trabalhos Domsticos de Zoro!

programme.title: Sanji passa o dia com um velho chef que o ensina o segredo de um tempero incrvel para sua culinria!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: O Choque de Sanji! O Velho Misterioso e Sua Comida Super Deliciosa!

programme.title: Franky e Iceburg passam a noite a construir o novo navio dos Chapus de Palha, mas o raiar do dia traz preocupantes novidades!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Todos Procurados! Os Piratas de 600 Milhes de Belly!

programme.title: Com o navio finalizado, Luffy e seu bando podem partir, mas precisaro roubar sungas para assegurar os servios de seu novo construtor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: O Rei das Selvas que Domina os Mares! O Navio dos Sonhos Concludo com Louvor!

programme.title: O Seu Jeito de Andar, (2014, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "ovelha negra" de uma famlia rica traz uma jovem ingnua e refugiada para o casamento de seu irmo.

programme.title: A Teoria do Amor, (1994, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: O mundo inteiro conhece a genialidade cientfica de Einstein. Mas ser que conhece seu lado casamenteiro? o que ir nos mostrar A Teoria do Amor, que resulta numa "comdia romntica divertida e adorvel" elogiada pelo pblico e pela crtica.

programme.title: Ghost Town - Um Esprito Atrs de Mim, (2008, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Aps uma experincia de quase morte durante uma colonoscopia, o mal-humorado dentista Bertrum Pincus fica chocado ao descobrir que pode conversar com os mortos.

programme.title: Crise da Meia Idade, (2022, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Nesta divertida comdia, Pete um terapeuta sexual bem-sucedido quando descobre, aos 30 anos, que nunca atingiu a puberdade. Agora, ele ter que navegar pelas dores e alegrias da adolescncia questionando todo seu conhecimento sobre a sexualidade.

programme.title: A Servio de Sara, (2002, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Sara Moore recebe os papis do divrcio e percebe que corre o risco de perder milhes. Ela convence o oficial de justia Joe Tyler a ajud-la a lidar com seu ex-marido e, para isso, fazem juntos uma viagem pelo pas.

programme.title: Sexo & Mentiras, (2020, Romance)
programme.desc: Uma explorao a intimidade na vida de dois casais e revela o que necessrio para alcanar uma unio de longo prazo, mantendo um relacionamento sexual saudvel e satisfatrio.

programme.title: Terapia do Sexo, (2013, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Um viciado em sexo em recuperao tenta cortejar uma nova namorada que sente a necessidade de expressar sua intensa sexualidade.

programme.title: Algumas Garotas, (2013, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Na vspera de seu casamento, um escritor de sucesso viaja pelo pas para encontrar ex-amantes na tentativa de reparar transgresses de relacionamentos anteriores.

programme.title: Por amor ou por dinheiro, (2019, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Um romance de conto de fadas toma um rumo inesperado quando Mark descobre que sua bela noiva, Connie, est planejando roub-lo. Para no ser tolo, Mark embarca em uma misso para ver at onde Connie ir roubar seu dinheiro.

programme.title: Epiphany - Amor e Perdo, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Uma jovem luta para criar um relacionamento com o pai aps a morte da tia que a criou.

programme.title: Confisses de um Filho, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Sean se rebela e sai da casa de sua famlia, para descobrir a vida por conta prpria. Dois anos mais tarde, enquanto ainda tenta encontrar respostas sobre sua vida, Sean confrontado pelo professor, que o desafia a rever sua vida como uma histria.

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Miguelina e Lala aconselham Diana a no ouvir Maximiliano porque ela pode sofrer muito; Maximiliano pede desculpas a Emilio pelo que fez com sua irm Camila.

programme.title: O Segredo da Floresta, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jay e Amy decidem fugir da rotina e partem para um retiro no campo. Durante um passeio, encontram uma menina amarrada dentro de uma cabana. Ao libertarem a garota, algo terrvel libertado.

programme.title: Uma Foto Antes de Morrer, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Na Rssia rural, um grupo de amigos se envolve em uma coliso com um veculo. Em busca de ajuda, eles acham uma cabana onde encontram uma foto representando seu acidente.

programme.title: Sede Mortal, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Uma estranha insnia se espalha por uma pequena cidade, causando psicose, medo e pnico. Dois casais encontram refgio em um rancho abandonado, mas outras pessoas aparecerem e o caos se instala.

programme.title: O Terror Atrs da Porta, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um grupo de jovens resolve explorar um abrigo abandonado, onde 60 anos atrs, experincias secretas eram realizadas. Agora, eles so sponsveis por abrir as portas de um local que jamais deveria ter sido visitado.

programme.title: Abismo do Medo, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Grupo de jovens amigas resolve fazer expedio a uma caverna. O deslizamento de uma rocha, porm, deixa as garotas presas com escassos suprimentos. medida que cresce a tenso, elas descobrem que criaturas estranhas e malignas habitam o local.

programme.title: Infidelidade, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Uma viagem de final de semana se transforma em um pesadelo quando um casal adltero obrigado a participar de um jogo doentio de sobrevivncia com seu sequestrador.

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Diana muito maltratada por Octavia e Marfil, o que surpreende Maximiliano.

programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.desc: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um jovem delinquente do ensino mdio obrigado a ser o tutor de uma escola de baixa renda. L, ele se apaixona pela filha do pastor e vive uma paixo cheia de diferenas e surpresas.

programme.title: Garoto Formiga 2 - A Vingana da Fria Vermelha, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps vencer a sua primeira batalha contra o crime, o garoto-formiga precisa lidar com as repercusses da fama. Enquanto enfrenta um novo e perigoso vilo, o menino ir fazer de tudo para impedir que um aluno da escola conquiste o corao de Ida.

programme.title: O Relgio Encantado, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Angel uma garota tmida que odeia dizer no. Ela encontra um relgio mgico que realiza desejos e a torna incrivelmente popular. Mas essa nova vida talvez no a deixe realmente feliz.

programme.title: Nosso Amor, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em um ntimo retrato do casamento, um casal que divide a vida h muitos anos precisa lidar com uma grave doena. Enquanto vivem o medo da perda, eles usam o humor e a parceria para manter a esperana.

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Big Stone Gap o lar de personagens charmosos e excntricos. Ave Maria Mulligan, uma farmacutica de 35 anos, a solteirona da cidade. A vida de Ave vira de cabea para baixo depois que ela descobre um segredo de famlia.

programme.title: Uma Viagem para a Espanha, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Steve Coogan e Rob Brydon conhecem restaurantes e hotis da costa espanhola, trocando piadas e impresses sobre seus almoos, conversando sobre paternidade, masculinidade e envelhecimento.

programme.title: Uma Paixo em Seoul, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Kim uma jovem filipina que vive com seus pais superprotetores. Quando descobre uma vaga para ensinar ingls a um empresrio em Seul, ela foge para uma vida nova. Ela s no espera viver um tringulo amoroso com seu aluno e o assistente dele.

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: A violncia do preconceito racial causa um boicote aos transportes por parte da comunidade negra nos anos 1950. Uma aristocrata decide, por convenincia, ajudar sua empregada, mas seu marido a probe. Essa imposio faz com que as duas se unam.

programme.title: Meu Nome Sara, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Sara Gralnik, uma polonesa judia cuja famlia foi morta pelos nazistas, foge para a Ucrnia usando a identidade roubada de uma amiga. Ela acolhida por um casal de fazendeiros, mas l descobre que seus novos amigos possuem segredos sombrios.

programme.title: O Dono da Festa, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Van Wilder ficou famoso na cidade por organizar as melhores festas da faculdade. Porm, o veterano forado a mudar sua rotina de sete anos aps perder a mesada do pai, deixando as festividades com os dias contados.

programme.title: a batalha dos espectros, e Bakura libera seu exrcito de fantasmas contra os zumbis devotos de Bonz, em busca do direito de entrar nos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas! Mas para quem o sino final tocar quando este duelo se der no Reino das Sombras?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: o jogo do amor, quando o gal de Hollywood Jean-Claude Magnum desafia Mai para um duelo para ganhar sua mo em casamento! Ser que Mai sucumbir ao charme de Jean-Claude, para no mencionar sua esquadra de monstros-ninja?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Que comecem os Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas! A habilidade e resistncia dos oito finalistas sero testadas ao extremo em uma arena de duelos suspensa a 300 metros de altura!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: o primeiro dos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas, e Yugi luta contra o esprito maligno do Anel do Milnio, que possui Bakura! Yugi destri os espectros grotescos de Bakura rapidamente, mas Bakura tem uma estratgia sada direto do cemitrio...
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Revelado o Esprito Escuro: Yugi vs. Bakura, Parte 1

programme.title: Bakura aciona a Tbua do Destino, que far Yugi perder automaticamente em cinco turnos! Como se isso j no fosse ruim, o Santurio das Trevas de Bakura afeta os pontos de vida de Yugi a cada ataque! Incapaz de atacar e ficando sem tempo, Yugi est preso!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Revelado o Esprito Escuro: Yugi vs. Bakura, Parte 2

programme.title: Slifer, o Drago Celeste de Yugi expelir seu ltimo sopro e vencer o duelo, mas Bakura poder no sobreviver a rajada do todo-poderoso Monstro Deus Egpcio!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Revelado o Esprito Escuro: Yugi vs. Bakura, Parte 3

programme.desc: A equipe kakashi encontra itachi uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Kakashi diz a todos para no olharem nos olhos sharingan de itachi. Kakashi se prepara para enfrentar itachi sozinho e pede que naruto d cobertura.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Crescimento De Naruto
programme.desc: Guy lamenta sua asneira ao ver seus trs alunos presos pela priso de gua.determinado a parar kisame, guy o desafia usando o nunchaku, sua arma favorita. um super taijutsu contra uma super fora humana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esfera Secreta De Chama
programme.desc: Vov chiyo e sakura salvam naruto do genjutsu de itachi.no mesmo instante, kakashi comea um contra-ataque. Uma batalha ninja de nvel alto comea e kakashi exibe toda sua destreza e percio usando uma ttica sutil.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Do Jinchurik!
programme.desc: Seus inimigos derrotados, kisame e itachi, parecem ter sido clones, cujos poderes e aparecimento foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Morte Do Gaara
programme.desc: As equipes kakashi e guy fazem uma pausa.vov chiyo observa naruto cochilar e lembra de sasori quando criana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Postura Ttica: Operao Entrada Em Gancho!
programme.desc: As equipe kakashi e guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki. Eles correm para se infiltrar mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. O nico jeito de quebrar a barreira removendo os cinco selos de uma s vez.
programme.sub-title: Postura Ttica: Operao Entrada Em Gancho!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e agora a equipe guy enfrentam cpias idnticas de si mesmos numa batalha.no esconderijo dos akatsuki, deidara e sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki de nove caudas.
programme.sub-title: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi!
programme.desc: Finalmente a luta entre av e neto comea. Sakura fica confusa com a aparncia estranha de sasori, e vov chiyo explica que aquele hiruko, o corpo que sasori usa para autodefesa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage
programme.desc: Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A terceira etapa da prova comea. Nela, os participantes lutam em batalhas individuais no estilo torneio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Diante de um adversrio que parece incrivelmente calmo e ameaador, Cho-Cho mostra uma seriedade raramente vista enquanto os companheiros de equipe torcem por ela.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A prova chega etapa final, com o incio dos confrontos de Sarada contra Araya, da Aldeia da Areia, e Mitsuki contra Shinki, tambm da Areia!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A batalha final do torneio comea com Boruto, Sarada e Shinki participando de uma disputa no estilo mata-mata.
programme.sub-title: O Usurio da Aldeia de Ferro: Shinki

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Momoshiki, Kinshiki e Urashiki, todos do Cl Otsutsuki, aparecem de repente na arena lotada de espectadores, e Boruto v de perto a extenso do poder de combate do pai.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto percebe o tamanho do amor de seu pai pela aldeia e as pessoas, o que tambm acaba sendo sua fraqueza.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sasuke e os Kages travam uma batalha intensa contra Momoshiki e Kinshiki do Cl Otsutsuki que so ridiculamente poderosos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com Boruto assistindo tudo atentamente, Naruto e Sasuke iniciam uma batalha contra o poderoso Momoshiki!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto j pediu desculpas a todos pelos erros cometidos durante a prova, mas continua preocupado com a profecia de Momoshiki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os famosos atores Tomaru e Ashina recebem ameaas de morte de uma pessoa desconhecida. Agora cabe s Equipes 7 e 10 os protegerem em uma misso em conjunto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O flerte de Tomaru deixa Cho-Cho nas nuvens, o que faz Sarada e os outros se perguntarem se a apaixonada Cho-Cho no perdeu o foco na misso!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O ninja com mscara de gs aparece novamente durante as filmagens e sequestra Tomaru.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Rock Lee, pai de Metal, anuncia que ele ensinar a Metal a tcnica suprema de taijutsu, Os Oito Portais Internos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps o ataque do Cl Otsutsuki, o Encontro dos Cinco Kages acontece na Aldeia da Folha. Os Kages atuais e seus predecessores se renem, exceto por Ohnoki, o Terceiro Tsuchikage.
programme.sub-title: A pedra mais dura do mundo

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os ninjas encarregados de guardar o Porto da Aldeia da Folha so atacados, e Mitsuki desaparece.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A aldeia descobre que Boruto e Sarada saram em busca de Mitsuki. Ento a Equipe 10, de Shikadai, recebe a misso de rastre-los e traz-los de volta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Orochimaru fala para Boruto e Sakura sobre o Sbio da Cobra Branca que vive na Caverna Ryuchi. No caminho, os dois so confrontados pela Equipe 10.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos descobrem que, para se encontrar com o Sbio da Cobra Branca, precisaro passar por uma srie de testes.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O Sbio da Cobra Branca pede que Boruto traga para ele uma "Escama Invertida" de Garaga, uma cobra problemtica.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e companhia trabalham juntos para conseguir a Escama Invertida de Garaga, mas a batalha se mostra difcil, uma vez que Garaga tem o poder de sentir a localizao dos inimigos e transform-los em pedra.
programme.sub-title: Um inimigo feroz: O ataque cruel de Garaga!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki vai para a terra natal de Kokuyou e Sekiei, o Pas da Terra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos conseguem superar Kokuyou e finalmente alcanam Mitsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Em vez de voltar para casa com Boruto, Mitsuki fica com Kokuyou.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto est ferido, inconsciente e no pode mais continuar. Todos pensam em voltar para a Aldeia da Folha.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Determinados a encontrar Ohnoki, a equipe se infiltra na aldeia sem saber que est sendo observada.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A equipe encontra Ohnoki, mas ele se recusa a ajudar. Para piorar a situao, eles so atacados e acabam se separando.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: No meio do caminho para o ponto de encontro, Boruto e Ohnoki se deparam com o Campo de Treinamento da Aldeia da Pedra.
programme.sub-title: Os pensamentos de Ohnoki e de Kou

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Para conseguir sair da barreira, Boruto busca desesperadamente pelo corao de pedra, mas no o encontra.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Kakou usa um Estilo Partcula raro e poderoso, levando Boruto ao limite.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Sarada so pegos e levados de volta para a base da Aldeia da Pedra junto com Ohnoki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband shes convicted of murdering staged his own death and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find himand that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: The Friends of Eddie Coyle, (1973, Thriller)

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)

programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

programme.title: The End, (1978, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: When Sonny (Burt Reynolds) is diagnosed with a fatal disease, he swallows a bottle of pills to end it all! Instead, he ends up in a loony bin beside the demented Marlon (Dom DeLuise) who is eager to help Sonny succeed...one madcap attempt at a time!

programme.title: The Longest Yard (1974), (1973, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this rough-and-tumble movie, actually filmed on-location at the Georgia State Prison, the cons are the heroes and the guards are the heavies.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a society in which major league sporting events have replaced Sunday worship as the religion of choice, North Dallas Forty appears like a desecration at the altar.

programme.title: Up in Smoke, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cheech and Chong make their film debut in this riotous rock'n'roll comedy, bringing with them the same madness, lifestyles and sketches that sold over 10 million records in the early 1970s.

programme.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail, (1975, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: Grossing the highest box-office of any British film in the US when released in 1975, this "cult classic" comedy from the Monty Python team loosely follows the legend of King Arthur, along with his squire and his Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Citizens and soldiers alike prepare for all-out war as Ace is led to the site of his execution. While the world watches, the true identity of the condemned man's father is shockingly revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TICKING DOWN TO THE TIME OF BATTLE! THE NAVY'S STRONGEST LINEUP IN POSITION!

programme.title: Flashbacks reveal the agonizing sacrifice made by Ace's mother in order save his life and the secret behind his connection to Luffy. Back in the present, Whitebeard makes an unexpected entrance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A VAST FLEET APPEARS! HERE COME THE WHITEBEARD PIRATES!

programme.title: As a massive seaquake rocks Marineford, Ace recalls the ups and downs of his life as a pirate, including his first encounter with Whitebeard and the unthinkable betrayal that led to his capture!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BEGINNING OF THE WAR! ACE AND WHITEBEARD'S PAST!

programme.title: Whitebeard begins his attack with a tsunami-spawning sea quake, but the marines counter with a blast of frigid air that turns the tidal wave into an iceberg! Will Luffy and his crew arrive in time to join the battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FORCE THAT COULD DESTROY THE WORLD! THE POWER OF THE TREMOR-TREMOR FRUIT!

programme.title: Fire meets ice as mythical warriors, erupting admirals, legendary pirates, and a giant giant go head to head in the biggest, baddest battle of all time! There's only one thing missing: Monkey D. Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN ALL-CONSUMING INFERNO!! ADMIRAL AKAINU'S POWER!

programme.title: A towering giant of a giant known as Little Oars Jr. carves a path of death and destruction as he fights to save Ace. The monstrous mauler is within arm's reach of his friend when he's intercepted by the seven warlords of the sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DESCENDANT OF THE BEAST! LITTLE OARS JR. FULL SPEED AHEAD!

programme.title: In the wake of Little Oars Junior's tragic defeat, Admiral Sengoku hatches a devious plan to speed up the countdown to Ace's execution. The situation looks beyond bleak until a hero enters the fray from on high!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: JUSTICE FOR THE WINNERS! SENGOKU'S STRATEGY IN ACTION!

programme.title: Luffy appears on the field of battle with a ferocious sense of urgency. Ace could be executed at any minute, and the rubber-man's refusal to back down impresses even the most feared men in all the world!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STRAW HAT TEAM ARRIVES! TENSION GROWS AT THE BATTLEFIELD

programme.title: Luffy leaps into action, attacking the Naval forces with a frantic display of brutality. Meanwhile, Ace watches in horror as an army of zombies rises up to attack his brother!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN IF IT MEANS DEATH! LUFFY VS. THE NAVY; THE BATTLE STARTS!

programme.title: Supernatural powers take center stage in the battle to save Ace as Luffy and his uniquely talented allies throw down with the Navy's own arsenal of Devil Fruit Eaters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HARD BATTLES, ONE AFTER ANOTHER! DEVIL FRUIT EATERS VS. DEVIL FRUIT EATERS!

programme.title: A gift from Boa Hancock and Ivan-san's Galaxy Wink get Luffy closer to Ace than ever, but a sword-wielding foe from the past threatens to derail the rescue mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KUMA'S TRANSFORMATION! IVA'S BLOW OF ANGER!

programme.title: Luffy runs into a lethal roadblock in the form of Hawk-Eye Mihawk. The legendary swordsman is determined to halt Luffy's onslaught, but Ivan-san, Boa Hancock, and Jimbei aren't ready to give up the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SWORDSMAN MIHAWK! LUFFY COMES UNDER THE ATTACK OF THE BLACK SWORD!

programme.title: Luffy and his pirate brethren have their hands full with an ominous army of unbeatable Kumas! While the inhuman minions march onward, Whitebeard encounters a former ally!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE EXTERMINATION STRATEGY IN ACTION! THE POWER OF THE PACIFISTAS!

programme.title: Whitebeard is betrayed and brutally stabbed by one of his own men! In the wake of this unthinkable act of treason, allegations about the legendary pirate bring the battle to a halt!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Whitebeard shrugs off his injuries and leads a ferocious charge into the heart of the enemy's defenses, but three deadly Admirals join forces to silence his shock wave attack as the pirates find themselves surrounded by impenetrable walls!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ENCIRCLING WALLS ACTIVATED! THE WHITEBEARD PIRATES BACKED INTO A CORNER!

programme.title: With the ice melting beneath his feet, Luffy begins a desperate final charge towards his soon-to-be-executed brother. Should his rescue attempt fail, death will surely embrace them both!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXECUTION ORDER ISSUED! BREAK THROUGH THE ENCIRCLING WALLS!

programme.title: Crocodile's unexpected assistance creates an opening for Luffy to advance, and Whitebeard has a surprise lurking beneath the ice that might swing the momentum in favor of the pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MOVING INTO THE FINAL PHASE! WHITEBEARD'S TRUMP CARD FOR RECOVERY!

programme.title: The battle rages on and the bodies pile up as Whitebeard squares off against an Admiral, Luffy gets knocked cold, and the legendary Vice-Admiral Garp finally enters the fray!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY AT THE END OF HIS TETHER! AN ALL-OUT BATTLE AT THE ORIS PLAZA!

programme.title: While awaiting his execution, Ace flashes back to a troubled youth seeking the truth about his father. Meanwhile, Luffy begs Ivan for a potentially-deadly treatment that will allow him to continue fighting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE POWER THAT WILL SHORTEN ONE'S LIFE! ENERGY HORMONE, REDUX!

programme.title: Whitebeard struggles to withstand the full force of the Marine onslaught. With the executioner's swords hovering above Ace's head, Straw Hat Luffy discovers a new ability!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO LIVE UP TO A PROMISE! LUFFY AND COBY COLLIDE!

programme.title: Whitebeard orders his men to help Luffy clear a path to the execution scaffold, but someone close to the Rubber-man rises to derail the rescue mission at the last second!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SCAFFOLD AT LAST! THE WAY TO ACE HAS OPENED!

programme.title: Luffy must defeat the man who taught him how to fight his own grandfather in order to save Ace. Battling his own flesh and blood won't be easy, but a waxy ally is there to provide backup!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EACH ON DIFFERENT PATHS! LUFFY VS. GARP!

programme.title: Ace is finally free from the execution scaffold! Luffy and his brother make a fearsome team as they blaze a path toward salvation. Ravaged by the war, Whitebeard wistfully commands his men to make the journey to the New World without him!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Despite Whitebeard's order to retreat, Ace is drawn back to the battlefield by the cruel taunts of a Marine adversary. Luffy watches in horror as his brother makes what could be his last stand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE POWER THAT CAN BURN EVEN FIRE! AKAINU'S RUTHLESS PURSUIT!

programme.title: An eerie silence falls over the battlefield as Luffy and Ace share a heartbreaking final moment together. With his dying breath, Ace begs his brother to convey a message to his fellow pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOOKING FOR THE ANSWER! FIRE FIST ACE DIES ON THE BATTLEFIELD!

programme.title: Anguished cries echo across the battlefield in the wake of Ace's tragic death. Luffy paralyzed by grief must be carried to safety, but Whitebeard summons the strength for one last ferocious attack!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HEADQUARTERS FALLS! WHITEBEARD'S UNSPEAKABLE WRATH!

programme.title: Whitebeard's children watch in horror as the old man faces off against the villainous Blackbeard pirates. Though his injuries are mounting and the odds are stacked against him, Whitebeard never runs away from a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ENDING THE MATTER! WHITEBEARD VS. THE BLACKBEARD PIRATES!

programme.title: The world reacts to Whitebeard's death with shock and awe. Meanwhile, Jimbei risks his life to save Luffy. Blackbeard reveals the depraved depths of his nefarious nature!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOW BEGINS! BLACKBEARD'S PLOT IS REVEALED!

programme.title: While Blackbeard and his men seek to sink Marineford, Jimbei and Luffy's desperate attempt to flee is thwarted by Akainu's fiery fists. The situation appears dire until a former enemy lends a sandy hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE INSATIABLE AKAINU! LAVA FISTS PUMMEL LUFFY!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law and the Heart Pirates offer Luffy a submarine escape route. Blackbeard continues his reckless rampage, and a puny pink-haired marine changes the world with a scream!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DESPERATE SCREAM! COURAGEOUS MOMENTS THAT WILL CHANGE THE FUTURE

programme.title: The Heart Pirates head for the bottom of the ocean as Trafalgar Law prepares to operate on Luffy and Jimbei. Meanwhile, the arrival of Shanks brings the bloodshed to a sudden halt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HERE COMES SHANKS! THE WAR OF THE BEST IS FINALLY OVER!

programme.title: The world rejoices in the wake of Whitebeard's death, and a host of powerful pirates vie for his position. Meanwhile, Luffy's friends fear that Ace's death may be more than the rubber-man can handle if he ever wakes up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MIGHTY LEADERS FACE EACH OTHER DOWN! HERALDING THE 'NEW ERA'!

programme.title: Power-hungry pirates terrorize innocent citizens once protected by Whitebeard. Luffy's nightmarish awakening sends him on a reckless rampage that could land him in an early grave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE MAIDEN ISLAND! THE HARSH REALITY FALLS UPON LUFFY!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Arrival, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When mysterious spacecraft touch down across the globe, an elite team - led by expert translator Louise Banks (Academy Award nominee Amy Adams) races against time to decipher their intent.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: Equilibrium, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, mankind has outlawed the things that trigger emotion-literature, music, and art. To uphold the law, a special breed of police is assigned to eliminate all transgressors. Christian Bale stars in this awesome high-tech action thriller.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her familyand unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: Arrival, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When mysterious spacecraft touch down across the globe, an elite team - led by expert translator Louise Banks (Academy Award nominee Amy Adams) races against time to decipher their intent.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Freedom Writers, (2007, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this story about a teacher in a racially divided school who gives her students what theyve always needed - a voice.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Freedom Writers, (2007, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this story about a teacher in a racially divided school who gives her students what theyve always needed - a voice.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: A Heaps prisoner makes a discovery; Carol searches for someone in the nearby forest; Rick and Morgan find themselves in the company of strangers.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The communities join forces in the last stand against the Saviors as all-out war unfolds.

programme.title: The communities join forces to restore a bridge that will facilitate communication and trade; someone is gravely injured at the construction site.

programme.title: Rick's vision of a civilized future is threatened by a sudden reckoning with past sins that remain unavenged and unforgiven.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The survivors encounter unfamiliar faces outside the safety of their community's walls and must decide whether or not this new group can be trusted.

programme.title: Carol seeks out an old friend living alone in a wilderness teeming with walkers; survivors make the perilous trek to a new home.

programme.title: A small rescue mission braves a dangerous herd in their hunt for a missing comrade, only to discover a surprising threat that could doom them all.

programme.title: The communities thought they could build a better future separately, but the recent loss of one of their own drives them to band together; new leaders rise when a disturbing and dangerous threat is unmasked; an escaped captive revisits his past.

programme.title: A new arrival at the Hilltop opens up about the leader of a group of mask-wearing savages; a search party sets out on a daring mission to find two missing friends.

programme.title: The savage group led by Alpha confronts the Hilltop in a harrowing attempt to retrieve her daughter; a supply run for the Kingdom turns into a dangerous quest.

programme.title: While one community struggles to ease tensions that threaten to divide from within, the true nature of another group comes into focus; a mission to rescue a friend has deadly consequences.

programme.title: An outsider's arrival forces Alexandria to rehash devastating old wounds; eye-opening secrets from the past are revealed.

programme.title: The fair at the Kingdom is underway, with all four communities coming together in celebration for the first time in years; while some pacts are renewed, other deals will come at a much steeper price.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Fish's Eye goes after Mamoru. But Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Zirconia threatens the Amazon Trio that if they dont capture Pegasus by the next new moon, the magic making them human will wear off.
programme.sub-title: Mirrors of Dreams: The Amazon's Last Stage

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus. But Momo starts acting peculiar and leaves, causing Chibi-Usa to become worried.
programme.sub-title: The Amazoness: Nightmare from Behind the Mirrors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami falls in love with a melody she finds online. She works on lyrics that match the melody and also goes to meet the composer, Toshiyuki Nishino.
